H0.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 10

H1.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 12

H2.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 8

H3.text: How many lines are there in a sonnet. 14

A4.text: The sonnets are almost all constructed using three quatrains (four-line stanzas) followed by a final couplet.

A5.text: With few exceptions, Shakespeare's sonnets observe the stylistic form of the English sonnetâ€”the rhyme scheme, the 14 lines, and the metre.
